message: The COLL_METHOD field for indicator 8-9-1, translated into all languages

data.en: UNWTO sends a pre-filled excel questionnaire (including data from official publications and official web-sites) to countries to collect the latest data on TDGDP. In order to lighten the reporting burden of countries, UNWTO receives data from the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD) on behalf of its constituents1. This exercise is being carried out on a yearly basis.
